properties.Name: ConsumerLoanStatus
properties.Description: The status and amount owed on the Loan as of the associated date.

Columns.Name: CreditGrantorId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Credit Grantor.

Columns.Name: LoanAccountNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a loan.

Columns.Name: ReportingDate
Columns.Description: The date for which the loan status and balance is calculated.

Columns.Name: ReportingPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period starting date associated with the status.

Columns.Name: ReportingPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period ending date associated with the status.

Columns.Name: LoanBalanceAmount
Columns.Description: The balance on a loan account is the amount remaining to be paid back.

Columns.Name: LoanTotalInterestPaidAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of interest paid to date upon the loan.

Columns.Name: LoanTotalPrincipalPaidAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of principal paid to date upon the loan.

Columns.Name: LoanTotalOverduePaymentsAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of overdue payments.

Columns.Name: LoanTotalDefaultPaymentsAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of total default payments.

Columns.Name: LoanLastPaymentAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of the last payment made.

Columns.Name: BillingCycleId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a billing cycle.

Columns.Name: LoanStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account Status.
